mapper.select: select id,userName from t_userinfo where isShow = 'show' and status = 0

select t1.id,t1.name,t1.type,t1.createDate,t1.effectiveDays,t2.userId,t2.userName from (select * from t_message_group where isShow = 'show') t1 left join (select * from t_message_group_detail where isShow = 'show') t2 on t1.id = t2.groupId
select userId from t_message_group_detail where isShow = 'show' and groupId = #{groupId}
select fromId,toId,content,type,sendDate,fileSize from t_message where fromId = #{userId} and toId = #{gorupId} and isShow = 'show' and isGroupMessage = 0 order by sendDate asc
select fromId,toId,content,type,sendDate,fileSize from t_message where fromId = #{fromId} and toId = #{userId} and isShow = 'show' and isGroupMessage = 1 order by sendDate asc
select fromId,toId,content,type,sendDate,fileSize from t_message where fromId = #{userId} and toId = #{toId} and isShow = 'show' and isGroupMessage = 1 order by sendDate asc
